settings.name: Projection
settings.description: Define the projection you want to transform your data into. It can be in a EPGS (e.g.: 'EPSG:4326'), ESRI (e.g.: 'ESRI:54009') or Proj.4 format (e.g.: '+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs +type=crs'). Leave this setting empty if you want to use the Azimuthal Equidistant (aeqd) projection below.

settings.name: Azimuthal Equidistant center
settings.description: Define how the center of the trajectory should be identified to project it into a Azimuthal Equidistant (aeqd) projection. A unit below must be selected.

options.displayText: center (midpoint of the range of coordinates of the trajectory)

settings.name: Azimuthal Equidistant units
settings.description: Choose the units of the Azimuthal Equidistant projection. Center or centroid above must be selected.
